Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.view.gui

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.view.gui.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller of the game scene. It contains the methods to handle the game scene, such as the chat, the board, the cards and the ranking list.

    Method
    Description
    void
    handleBoardClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    This method handles the click on the board of the player it shows the possible positions where the card can be placed with a gold image it places the card on the board in the gold image position clicked it removes the gold image from the board

    This method shows the other board of the player clicked in the ranking list

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded. It is used to initialize the controller.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.Ã¹ added the zoom and drag functionality to the board created the matrix of the board positions

    • start

      public void start(ViewGui gui)
      This method links the gui to the controller
      Parameters:
      gui - the gui to link sets the starting card, the secret objective, the cards on hand and the objectives sets the resources counter, the id of the player and the ranking list, the first pawn and the global points

    • updatePoints

      public void updatePoints(int[] boardPoints, int[] globalPoints)
      This method updates the points of the players, updates the ranking list and the resources counter
      Parameters:
      boardPoints - the points of the players on the board
      globalPoints - the global points of the players

    • updateDecks

      public void updateDecks(ResourceCard res, GoldCard gold, int drawPos)
      This method updates the deck of the resources and the gold deck on the board
      Parameters:
      res - the resource card to set in the deck or empty position
      gold - the gold card to set in the deck or empty position
      drawPos - the position of the card drawn on the table
